text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
She must have laughed when she<n>heard people say this
was no place<n>for a queen.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
Dark hair blowing in the wind, she<n>danced into the lead as if
it were a<n>game. All anyone could do was bow<n>before her
majesty.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: This queen's name was Vodka.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
She turned everyone's dream into<n>her own glory. And her
eyes shone<n>with the light of a future which no one<n>had
ever seen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The season passes into autumn,<n>finally bringing the day of
the Solefall<n>Faire.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The exhibit I prepared with Winning<n>Ticket becomes a big hit
at the event.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And then, and then! Check out this<n>Derby—it was so moving!
Right,<n>Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Okay, okay. Just show it to us nice<n>and slow.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You did well to make such a fine<n>exhibit while also training
for your<n>races.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I was sooo busy. But my trainer<n>helped, and we got through
it<n>somehow!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, yeah! I haven't introduced<n>anybody yet!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: This is my trainer! And this is Taishin<n>and Hayahide!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Narita Taishin and Biwa Hayahide.<n>Classmates of Winning
Ticket's, they<n>all made their debuts around the<n>same time.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hi. So... you must have your hands<n>full with her.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. I can imagine babysitting<n>Ticket is quite the
challenge. To think,<n>she even roped you into assisting<n>with
the exhibition.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Come ooon! Is that what you two<n>really think of me?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
You've got it backwards! Trainer<n>came to help me with the
exhibit first!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Two people preparing a Derby exhibitteam up to win the Derby—that's gottabe fate. FATE!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and speaking of fate, that reminds<n>me! You remember
the promise we<n>made when we first met, right?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: The one we made in our first training<n>class?

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
All right, everyone, to begin with,<n>we're going to time your
runs. I'd like<n>you all to pick a distance that suits<n>your
aptitude, and measure your<n>times.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, oh, Instructor! Can I run 2,400<n>meters, just like the
Derby?

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Uh, yeah... It's up to you. But new<n>students usually start
with about half<n>that.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I know! But my goal's the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Um, all right then... I'll ask just in<n>case—does anyone else
want to run<n>2,400 meters?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Me...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I would like to run 2,400 meters as<n>well.

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text: Really?! Are you all serious?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huff... Wheeze... I-I can't do iiit!My time is way too slow!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ugh!

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
2,400 meters... Running a classics<n>distance is no simple
task.

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
You should work on mastering some<n>basics first and
improve to the point<n>where you can run the whole thing.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Pant... Huff... U-understood...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I'll do it one day...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I will master this distance...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Heh... Ehehe! Hey, you two! Thanks<n>for running with me!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I didn't do it for you, so don't thank<n>me. That's just the
distance I aim to<n>run someday.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's simply a distance one must be<n>competent in to become
a great racer.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I knew it! You're both going for the<n>Derby too! Three
students in the same<n>class with eyes on the same goal...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Waaagh! What a story! Let's all race<n>in the Derby
togetheeer!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ack! Wait... Why're you crying?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Our race'll be one for the history<n>books! The most heated,
dramatic<n>Derby ever!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Ticket's eyes shine brightly as she<n>recounts the tale of how
they took the<n>first step toward their dreams<n>together.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Aaall right! Let's make that promise<n>one more time! All
together now! One,<n>two... DEEERBYYY!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? You didn't say it!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
The curator of this exhibit is starting<n>to annoy me. Let's go
somewhere<n>else.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I believe there's entertainment on the<n>outdoor stage.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whaaat?! Hold on!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: We're just kidding. But really, I need<n>to get to training soon.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Training? Right in the middle of the<n>Solefall Faire?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Taishin's running in the next race.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, right! You know I'll be there<n>rooting for ya, Taishin!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She's training for her race even<n>during a school event...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Contrary to Narita Taishin's gruff<n>exterior, she's actually
quite<n>disciplined.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Then let's go one more time to get in<n>the spirit! One, two...
DEEERBYYY!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I told you, that's annoying!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Several days later.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're around the fourth corner and<n>Narita Taishin is in
second! But wait!<n>The other racers are close behind!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishiiin! Go! YOU CAN DO IT!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Ticket's fervent cheers prove futile,<n>and Taishin places
sixth.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishin!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hey, Ticket...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: D-don't worry about it! We'll train for<n>the next one together!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, but don't bother trying to cheer<n>me up. I wanna be
alone right now.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh... Uh, sorry...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Three good friends all aim to win the<n>Derby. But this race
serves as a bitter<n>reminder that the path to achieving<n>such
a dream is a bumpy one.
